source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_SEQ_00<tab>Eaduuard wants to make a tombstone for his late sister.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_SEQ_00<tab>エドワードは妹の墓石にする石が欲しい。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_SEQ_01<tab>Eaduuard wants a solemn tombstone made that is worthy of his late sister. Find for him some cloud marble in the outcrops to the east.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_SEQ_01<tab>エドワードの妹の墓石を作るため、材料の石が必要なようだ。東の岩場で「白く輝く石」を取ってこよう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained the cloud marble. Take it to Brother Esmour at the Church of Saint Adama Landama.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_SEQ_02<tab>白く輝く石を手に入れた。「聖アダマ・ランダマ教会」の「エスムール」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_SEQ_03<tab>Brother Esmour seems displeased at Eaduuard's adamance for getting the cloud marble, but he understands the child's need to grieve in his own way. Speak with Eaduuard and let him know his stone has been acquired.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_SEQ_03<tab>白く輝く石をエスムールに渡した。「聖アダマ・ランダマ教会」の「エドワード」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_SEQ_04<tab>Eaduuard is relieved that the tombstone for his sister can now be prepared using the proper materials. However, it seems he will have to work at the church for a while in order to cover the expenses of the funeral.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_SEQ_04<tab>妹の墓石を用意することができて、エドワードはホッとしているようだ。だが彼は、葬式代としてこの教会でしばらく働くらしい。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_TODO_00<tab>Obtain a slab of cloud marble.
TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the cloud marble to Brother Esmour.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_TODO_01<tab>エスムールに白く輝く石を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_EADUUARD_000_1<tab>You're one of them 'venturer folk, ain't ye? I'd be much obliged for a li'l help. I'd like to make a tombstone for my kid sister what passed, ye see...
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_EADUUARD_000_1なあ、あんた冒険者なんだろ？
俺……妹の墓を作りたいんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_EADUUARD_000_2<tab>But I ain't got the gil to get it done. I hear there's nice rocks for the takin' a ways from here, but I ain't old enough to fend off no wild beasts or such.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_EADUUARD_000_2でも、墓石を買うお金がなくて……。
墓石になりそうな石が採れる場所の近くには、
危険な魔物がいて、俺は近寄るなって言われてるんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_EADUUARD_000_3<tab>Was hopin' for a bit o' cloud marble. She really woulda liked that. Crops right up out the ground to the east o' here, they say. If you could find a bit and see it to Brother Esmour, me and my sis'd be ever so grateful.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_EADUUARD_000_3墓石にする「白く輝く石」は、東の岩場にある。
……石が取れたら、司祭のエスムールに渡してくれよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_ESMOUR_000_11<tab>Cloud marble? To make into a tombstone for Eaduuard's sister? <sigh> That boy is nothing if not trouble.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_ESMOUR_000_11エドワードの妹の墓石が用意できたのか……綺麗な石だ。
……まったく、あのガキは世話が焼けるぜ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_ESMOUR_000_12<tab>It was all I could do to convince him not to go looking for a stone on his own. Still, I suppose it cannot be helped, and losing a loved one is never easy. Thank you for your part in this. I will see the marble is used as Eaduuard wishes.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_ESMOUR_000_12危険だっつーのに、自分で石を取ってこようとするからよ、
俺らはあのガキを止めるのに、かなり苦労したんだぜ？
……エドワードの手伝いをしてくれて、ありがとよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_EADUUARD_000_20<tab>Gods, you 'venturers sure are kind folk! Now all I need is coin for the funeral. I'm gonna stay on here at the church for a bit and help out.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_EADUUARD_000_20……ありがと、冒険者って優しいんだな。
あとは、ここで下働きをして、埋葬料を稼ぐだけだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_EADUUARD_000_21<tab>Wouldn't be right to leave <var 1A 02 /var>everythin'<var 1A 01 /var> up to someone else. It'll mean more to my sis if I do what I can on my own.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_EADUUARD_000_21へへ、自分でできることは、自分でしたいんだ。
俺が頑張ったほうが、妹も喜ぶ気がしてさ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_EADUUARD_000_22<tab>Brother Esmour and Sister Airell are good folk, too. They say I don't need no gil to bury my sis here, but I know how it works. It'll take coin to send her over to Thal proper.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_EADUUARD_000_22エスムールもアイレルも優しいからさ、
埋葬料はいらないって言われたんだけどな。
妹をザル神の所に送るためにも、俺頑張るよ。
TEXT_SUBWIL119_00629_ACCESS_MESSAGE<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません
